data.name: ValidationUnsuccessfulWarning
data.value: Could not validate the storage account and subscription given. Are you sure you want to continue {0}?

data.name: StorageIsNotInTheSameLocationAsVault
data.value: Storage account given is in a different location as compared to the current vault. Please provide a storage account with the same location as that of the vault.

data.name: StorageAccountValidationUnsuccessful
data.value: The Subscription or Storage account couldn’t be validated. For failovers to be successful, the Subscription should belong to your account, the Storage account to the Subscription and Storage account location must be the same as location of your Vault.

data.name: CmdletWillBeDeprecatedSoon
data.value: It is recommended that you use the Azure Site Recovery PowerShell cmdlets for Azure Resource Manager (https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt637930.aspx) to perform this action. The '{0}' cmdlet will be deprecated at some point in the future.
